parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post includes a CMF number (CMF 11240015), indicating it's likely electoral propaganda.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions "Elena Lasconi" and promotes her candidacy for president, clearly identifying a parliamentary candidate.  This fulfills Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>As a paid Facebook post, it's designed to reach a wide audience, not just individuals. This satisfies Article 36 (7) - c.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective is to encourage voters to support Elena Lasconi and the USR party. The call to action "Votează USR! Votează echipa Elena Lasconi!" directly aims to influence voting behavior. This fulfills Article 36 (7) - c.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post lacks journalistic objectivity. It's a clear endorsement, not an informative piece. It does not adhere to journalistic standards.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>This is not a personal opinion; it's a direct appeal for votes.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>435012952985112</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post meets all criteria for electoral propaganda under Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers to a specific candidate (Elena Lasconi), targets a wide audience through a paid Facebook advertisement, and has the clear objective of influencing voters to choose USR. The presence of a CMF number further strengthens this conclusion.  The post's content is promotional, not journalistic.  There are no counterarguments to suggest otherwise.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate>
    <name>Elena Lasconi</name>
    <impact>POSITIVE</impact>
  </candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>USR</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
USR Maramureș, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame plătite pe Facebook (ID postare: 435012952985112) după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care promovează candidatul Elena Lasconi și Partidul USR pentru alegerile parlamentare, îndemnând la vot prin fraza „Votează USR! Votează echipa Elena Lasconi!”, având ca efect electoral influențarea votului în favoarea candidatei menționate. Prezența numărului CMF 11240015 confirmă natura electorală a postării, care nu se încadrează în limitele jurnalismului sau ale exprimării unei opinii personale, ci constituie propagandă electorală interzisă după încheierea perioadei legale de campanie.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
